alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Bay, southern Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 645 PM EDT/545 PM CDT/... At 548 PM EDT/448 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Eglin Air Force Base to 6 miles northeast of Santa Rosa Beach to 15 miles southeast of De Funiak Springs. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Ebro, Portland, Villa Tasso, Seminole Hills, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Rock Hill, Gulf Pines, Bunker, Grayton Beach, Sandestin, Four Mile Village, Inlet Beach, Miramar Beach, Bruce, Point Washington and Pine Log. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
